skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: w. b. c. l. classic christian
Developer Terms of Use
des: Classic Christian is an extension of the WBCL Radio Network, featuring songs from the 70’s, 80’s, 90’s and early 2000’s that helped define the genre of Contemporary Christian Music and grow the industry into what it is today. It’s not just nostalgic. These songs still impact our faith today. So rewind, enjoy some of your old favorites, and tell your friends about WBCL’s Classic Christian!
priv:
